channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OR

item.title: Report X-2024010082
item.description:
Report X-2024010082

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-10T15:11:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-20
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE BROUGHT FROM UNDECLARED HOLD AREA FOR PROCESSING THROUGH ETT. DAMAGE INSPECTION; LEAKER; NON REGULATED NON AEROSOL PRODUCT LEAKED

item.title: Report X-2024010077
item.description:
Report X-2024010077

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-09T06:14:28+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-15
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS LEAKING AND WAS BROUGHT BY RESPONDER TO THE PSC AND UPON OPENING THE PACKAGE RESPONDER DISCOVERED THERE WERE 3 AEROSOLS WITH NO HAZARD LABELS. RESPONDER PROCESSED AS UNDECLARED HAZMAT.

item.title: Report X-2024010035
item.description:
Report X-2024010035

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-09T06:14:28+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-20
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: THE PACKAGE FELL OFF A RETRACTED LOADER AND DROPPED TO THE FLOOR. AFTER IT LANDED, THE PACKAGE BEGAN SPILLING BATTERY ACID ONTO THE TRAILER FLOOR. THE LEAKING PACKAGE, BEARING A CLASS 8 DIAMOND AND PROPER SHIPPING NAME "BATTERIES, WET, FILLED WITH ACID," WAS CLEANED UP USING THE CORROSIVE RESPONSE SHEET AND RETURNED TO THE PSC FOR PROCESSING THROUGH THE DMP.

item.title: Report X-2023120686
item.description:
Report X-2023120686

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-08T00:36:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-11
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered leaking, removed from trailer, and brought to QA. DescribePack: Inner seal on one bottle of Ecolab Daily Disinfectant Cleaner appeared to be corroded and leaking. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: package was placed right side up in a lined spill bin and brought to appropriate damage processing area.

item.title: Report X-2023120614
item.description:
Report X-2023120614

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-04T15:11:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-05
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered leaking, removed from the trailer, and brought to QA. DescribePack: One 946mL spray bottle was leaking from under the cap, which was not discernably loose. No hazardous markings, repeated similar shipments, 6 that I can remember. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed upright in a spill bin and brought to appropriate damage processing area.
